{{ item.title | slice : 0 : 18 }}

$ {{ item.price }}

 
import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import { ApiService } from "src/app/Services/api.service"; import { product } from "./productmodal"; @Component({ selector: "app-product-view", templateUrl: "./product-view.component.html", styleUrls: ["./product-view.component.css"], }) export class ProductViewComponent implements OnInit { data: any | product[]; item: any; constructor(private api: ApiService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.displayproducts(); localStorage.removeItem("ecomdata"); } addtocart(item: product) { this.api.addtocart(item); } removeitem(item: product) { this.api.removecartitem(item); } searchData: any | product[]; onSearchChange(query: string) { this.displayproducts(query); } }
